scripts.build: tsc --build --force && tsx esbuild.config.ts && cd ../.. && npx rollup -c rollup.config.js --input packages/core/dist/index.d.ts --file packages/core/dist/index.bundled.d.ts --format es --plugin dts && cd packages/core && find dist -name '*.d.ts' ! -name '*.bundled.d.ts' -delete && find dist -name '*.d.ts.map' -delete && find dist -type d -empty -delete
